trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANMAM101_05261_SEQ_00<tab>Kageel Ja is eager to put an end to their weed problem.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANMAM101_05261_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested supplies to Kageel Ja.

TEXT_BANMAM101_05261_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near Cenote Neyozzote)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near Cenote Neyozzote)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> at Cenote Moxutural)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANMAM101_05261_KAGEELJA_000_000<tab>The improved quality of the soil has done wonders for our budding crops, but the weeds have also seen fit to grow in abundance.
TEXT_BANMAM101_05261_KAGEELJA_000_001<tab>A perfect opportunity to test a new concoction Anggir has devised to discourage their growth. Might I trouble you to help procure ingredients for it?
TEXT_BANMAM101_05261_KAGEELJA_000_002<tab>The weeds in the fields seem to sprout nearly as fast as we can pull them. For a mercy, Anggir's weed killer has proven a boon in curbing their growth.
TEXT_BANMAM101_05261_KAGEELJA_000_003<tab>I fear we're running low, however, so I would again ask that you help us procure ingredients.
TEXT_BANMAM101_05261_KAGEELJA_000_005<tab>What we lack most at present is spring water from Cenote Neyozzote. Have care not to get lost─the paths there are said to be quite dark.

TEXT_BANMAM101_05261_KAGEELJA_000_006<tab>If you search about Cenote Neyozzote, there are herbs whose oils are said to hinder the growth of other plants. Have care not to get lost, though─the paths are known to be quite dark.
TEXT_BANMAM101_05261_KAGEELJA_000_007<tab>In the waters around Cenote Moxutural, there is a fish whose innards can be used to hinder the growth of weeds.
TEXT_BANMAM101_05261_KAGEELJA_000_008<tab>They're said to be quite fond of golden stonefly nymphs, so I would suggest bringing a few to use as bait. You'll know when you've caught one.
TEXT_BANMAM101_05261_KAGEELJA_000_010<tab>Bring me spring water from Cenote Neyozzote, and I will see to the rest.
TEXT_BANMAM101_05261_KAGEELJA_000_011<tab>Bring me a bundle of the herbs we need from Cenote Neyozzote, and I will see to the rest.

TEXT_BANMAM101_05261_KAGEELJA_000_012<tab>Bring me one of those fish from Cenote Moxutural, and I will see to the rest. Shouldn't take long for them to start biting with a golden stonefly nymph on your line.
TEXT_BANMAM101_05261_KAGEELJA_000_015<tab>So, how did you fare?
TEXT_BANMAM101_05261_KAGEELJA_000_016<tab>Excellent! With this, I imagine we'll not want for deterrent for quite some time.

TEXT_BANMAM101_05261_KAGEELJA_000_017<tab>I can still remember when only a few hands were needed to quickly pick the weeds. That we need go to such lengths to contend with them can be frustrating, yet strangely gladdening.
TEXT_BANMAM101_05261_KAGEELJA_000_018<tab>It is a reminder of the newfound bounty our land may provide given the proper care. Hope for a better tomorrow has taken root here in Yak T'el.
TEXT_BANMAM101_05261_KAGEELJA_000_019<tab>That's not to say our work has become easier, of course─the resilience of the weeds has seen to that.
TEXT_BANMAM101_05261_KAGEELJA_000_020<tab>Now, if you'll excuse me, there are crops that want for tending, and weeds for wilting.
